200b6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ yang dag par spong ba rnamang / 
200b7('bum): 'dus pa lags/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par/ dbang po rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha la// 
200b8('bum): dbar/ stso a rnams 'das pa lags/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol/ phyin par/ byang chub kyi yan lag mas 'das pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ 'phags pa'i sam yan
201a1('bum): / lag brgyad pa 'dus pa lags/ de ltar shes rab kyi rol tu phyin par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ bsam gtad dam
201a2('bum): bags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ tshad med pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa la
201a3('bum): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lag
201a4('bum): deltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mang ba dang / smon pa med pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par mngon par shes par
201a5('bum): 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyid par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags/ de ltar
201a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par/ mi 'jigs rnams 'das pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
201a7('bum): par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byams pa chen po 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par/ snying rje chen po 'du
201a8('bum): lags/ de ltar ges rab kyi pha rol tu byed par/ sangs khyab kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang ba dang la/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nying ma mchis pa
201b1('bum): mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pad dag rnam pa de lta bur gdags par 'jur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'dol
201b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung
201b3('bum): yo pa bsgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin skam mo// shes rab sgom mo// sbru ma lnga bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // 
201b4('bum): skom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// srog shA lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shed sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // da som mo// 
201b5('bum): 'grus cob po/ nga 'dzin sgom mo// zhes rabasgom mo// chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas sheng/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsoma'o// 
201b6('bum): ngange 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 
201b7('bum): 'a'adzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// sgra brnyan lta ba'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'bras rtsom mo// 
201b8('bum): tingange 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yangs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // babod pa sgom mo// btsun 'grub rtsom
202a1('bum): / ma/ ting nge 'dzin sgom go// shes rab rnam pa// dra ba'i grong khyer lta bu'i rgyabar len pa'i phung po stsa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // rgyal khrims kyang ngo // bzod pa snyam mo/ 
202a2('bum): brtsod 'akrus com mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims byung ngo // bzod pa slob
202a3('bum): mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// de 'di ltar rtog ste/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ mi lam lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po ldan/ 
202a4('bum): a m+b+ha buste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lda ste/ smig sbru lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i bu bo lnga sa/ surba bu ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i ltung / 
202a5('bum): ni/ mig yor lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ gzugs brtan lta 'u ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// 
202a6('bum): tebar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ dri 'grong khyer lta ba ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la rang bzhin gang
202a7('bum): yang med do// sgyu ma la rang bzhin gang yang med do// smig rgyal rang bzhin gang yang med do// drukA la rang bzhin gang yang medade// mig yor la rang bzhin gang yang med do// sgra brnyan la rang bzhin gang
202a8('bum): yang med do// gzugs brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang med de// dri ba'i grong khyer la rang bzhin gang yang med do// skal pa la rang bzhin gang yang med ngo // gang sa rang bzhin med pa de la mtshan nyid meng / 
202b1('bum): na ta ba pa na/ ga tshan cad med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// byabar rtogs par byed de/ rab 'a na rnam grang sa desan/ spyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sbyin pa mtshan
202b2('bum): nyid med pa'o// gtong ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// len pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/ gang de ltar shes nas sbyid pa gtong ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par
202b3('bum): byed pa yin te/ sbyin pa'i ba ral tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ tshul sems kyi rol tu phyin pa las kyi ma ldog ga/ zod pa pa la byen pa las byer mi ldan go// con 'phru
202b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go// de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas sheng/ 
202b5('bum): bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dran pa nye bar
202b6('bum): gzhag pa badzidi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par/ 
202b7('bum): da do// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid
202b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// skye stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po
203a1('bum): sa su gas pa sa dang mapa nyi ya sardzogs pa byed // 'dus byas sto pa nyid bas su rdzogs par so// 'das ma byam ni ga sa
203a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
203a3('bum): par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mi dmig
203a4('bum): pastong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'ongango bo nyid stong pa nyid
203a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs
203a6('bum): pabapar byed do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs
203a7('bum): par byed do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin
203a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byams pa chen po yongs su rdzog
203b1('bum): par byed do// rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas rgya chos ma 'das pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//  'phags pa 'chos byang ba 'jig rten pas 'das pa/ 'a
203b2('bum): ma yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
203b3('bum): / tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi drung du/ rdzu 'phral gyis song zhing / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsten bkur byed de/ longs spyod dang
203b4('bum): skye pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do// gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdus pa de dag
203b5('bum): nga/ tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do// gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / bzod pas yongs su srung ngo // gang brtson 'grus kyis/ yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su
203b6('bum): / gang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bsdu pa de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do// gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyis yongs su babyud ngo do// gang nang stong pa nyid kyis
203b7('bum): yongs su snga ba de dag kyang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang gyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de
203b8('bum): / dag kyang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdungad ngo // gang snying pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba dag kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdang ngo // gang zan po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
204a1('bum): bsdu 'di dag kyang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su su da // gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'asla ba dag kyang / don dam pastong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang
204a2('bum): 'jus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'dus ma skyes stong pa nyid kyis yongs su gru de dag cag/ 'dus ma byam myong
204a3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa
204a4('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis/ yong su bsru ba de dag kyang des med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs spyad do// gang
204a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yong su bsdu ba de dag kya rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs sdud do// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sud
204a6('bum): ge satshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / mi dmigs pa stong
204a7('bum): panyid kyis yongs su sdung ngo // gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ngos nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de
204a8('bum): dag kyang / rab nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba da dag kyang / dngos po me pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// 
204b1('bum): dran pa ta bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / yang dag par
204b2('bum): spong ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bsdub
204b3('bum): dedag kyang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bsdu
204b4('bum): de dag kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang lam gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / lam gyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba de dag
204b5('bum): kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su
204b6('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su chud do// gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
204b7('bum): kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdud do// gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
204b8('bum): kyis yongasas sgru ba de gcang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su spyad do// gang rnam par thar pa'i / stong pa nyid dang / mtshanam med pa dag / smon pa med pas
205a1('bum): / yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyag/ rnam par bar pa'// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa medapas yongs su sdud do// gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
205a2('bum): kyang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud ngo // gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su sdud ngo // gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
205a3('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsu ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam
205a4('bum): kyis yong su sdud do// gang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu bde dag
205a5('bum): kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang byams pa chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / byams pa chen pos yongs sdud ngo // gang snying rje chen pos yongs gu
205a6('bum): bde dag kyang / snying rje chen pos yongs su sdud do// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su rung
205a7('bum): gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rgun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su sdang ngo // gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang
205a8('bum): lan cig phyar 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yong su srung ngo // gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / phyir me 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do// gang dgra bcom pa te
205b1('bum): yangs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / dgra btsam pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang rang byang chub kyis yongs su bsdu ba dag kyang / rang byang chub kyis yangs su sdung ngo // gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pacwa
205b2('bum): yongs su bslu ba de dag kyang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
205b3('bum): yongs su sdung ngo // de ltar gang dang gang dge pa'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdung ngo // de dge ba'i rtsa bde dag dang ldan zhing chos
205b4('bum): thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/ 'khor ba nye bar len kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos te/ de sems can rnams kyi don tu mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/ phun sum
205b5('bum): de dag gi sems can rnams yongs su sdud do// des chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
205b6('bum): shes kyang de la mi gnas so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so// dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so// rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
205b7('bum): deni 'di ltar nges chos thams cad shes par byas te/ nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar
205b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pa sa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyi
206a1('bum): / bar shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes pa// brtson 'grus kyipha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
206a2('bum): nyid med par shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// phyi nang stong
206a3('bum): re mtshan nyid med par shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// chen po stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par sheso// don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so//

206a6('bum): med par shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// 
206a7('bum): spong ba nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// dngos po med pa'i ngo na nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// yang dag
206a8('bum): nga ba rnabs mtshan nyid med par shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi kong pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// dbang po rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// stobs rnams
206b1('bum): shAs s+ho// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan tad med par shesas// 'phags pa'am ma yan lag 'a byamand med pa shes so// 'phags pa'i bangan pa rnams mtshan nyid mdu
206b2('bum): so// bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// tshad med pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so//

206b4('bum): rlon pa med pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan nyid medapa
206b5('bum): shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid med par shes

206b8('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid med par shes so// rang byang chub mtshan nyid med par shes so// lam gyi rnam par shes pa cid mtshan nyid med par shes mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da ba
207a1('bum): / nying mang bar shes sa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung / 
207a2('bum): lagan sa/ skam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sreg su lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ chu bla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ mig yor lta bu'i nye bar byer
207a3('bum): pa'i phung lnga la gnas/ zla brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ dri ba'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i lung
207a4('bum): rna ya gnas/ zlum pa lnga bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a5('bum): napo// de yang nye bar yin pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smrig rgyu lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lngan
207a6('bum): bar shes/ nye bar len pa'i lung po lnga mig yor lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ga zugs brnyan lta bur shes/ nye bar len
207a7('bum): nga po lnga dri ba'i grong khyer lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa phung po la sprul pas bur shes nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa/ ma zhag pa/ ma ral ba/ skyon med pa/ rnog
207a8('bum): med pa/ nyams pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ 'phags par gyur pa/ zag pa med pa/ lam gyi khongs su chud pa 'jig rten las 'das pa yang
207b1('bum): rdzogs par byed de// de la gnas shing yang dag par blangs pa'i 'arda' dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dmag 'apa
207b2('bum): ra dang / spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi rgyud pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // de tshul khrims de lta bu dad ldan yang 'das bdag rkyal rigs che zhing mtho bo'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa'am/ phram
207b3('bum): ma'o ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o'am/ rgyal phran nam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'byung bar bya'o/ 
207b4('bum): 'a/ rgyal chen pa de'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba/ mnyam par skye bar bya'o// dus/ sum curtsagasum mam mtsho ma 'am/ dga' ldan nam/ 'phral dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phral dang
207b5('bum): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o na 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mngong ba'i 'bras brangam/ dang bcom pa nyi
207b6('bum): rang byang chub bam/ byang chub thob par bya'o zhes/ tshul khrims des snyems pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du
207b7('bum): tshan nyid gcig pas na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rungango // mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang / mtshan nyid mdad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo / 
207b8('bum): dgra dad pa'am/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid ma dad pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rurung // rab 'byor de lar dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
208a1('bum): / rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems
208a2('bum): dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i tshe/ mi skye ba'i chos la ba'od pa 'thob te/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thong nas gsus
208a3('bum): sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgyal gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
208a4('bum): kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang / 'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par mi
208a5('bum): 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba'am/ sdod pa'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba byed kyang del 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ sdod pa'am 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba yang mi dmigs te/ 
208a6('bum): can rnams kyi don kyang byed do// sems can dang sems can du btags pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
208a7('bum): rgyar shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med pa theg pa gnyis kyis longs
208a8('bum): dumya ngan las bzlas kyang / gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas des tshe'i 'du byed sbyangs na ga sprul
208b1('bum): dasprul pa mang dang / phung po ma lus pa'i bya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan lal 'das so// rab 'byor dasgyur sprul pa des// bskal pa gcig yon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
208b2('bum): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'ad par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam
208b3('bum): tsho ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dngos po gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208b4('bum): nga sems can nam/ sems can drug dgas pa yang mi dmigs la/ sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ re yongs su rdzogs par mtshan nyid med pa'i
208b6('bum): mas cad khongs su chud par shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe na/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye sa
208b7('bum): men pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sku brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig tu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar lon pa'i phung po la gnas
208b8('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i 'bod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
209a1('bum): gnas shing / 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyisaHsa
209a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ gnyis ga pa de na/ nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos khongs du chud pa'i bzod pa'o// de la nyams bu len pa'i
209a3('bum): bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar b.rung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te/ sems
209a4('bum): can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing / gshe ba 'am/ mi snyan par rjod cing / ma klas pa'i tshig brlang ba zer bar gyur tam/ rdo dbyug dang mngon chas brdegs sam/ btab
209a5('bum): kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'am/ 
209a6('bum): gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par mi bya ste/ phyir sems can de dag la/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/ 'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems
209a7('bum): mi bskyed kyi/ 'di ni bdag nyid kyis gung po dgrar gyur pa/ 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o// byams pa dang ldan te snying rje bar gyur nas/ rnam
209a8('bum): pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o// de la tsha'i khong duchung ba'i bzod pa ga pa zhe na/ sems can de dag kyang do dang papa 'ang rigam su med na/ bdag la gshes
209b1('bum): 'am/ me ldan par brjod pa'am/ maklas pa'i tshig badrang po zer ba 'am/ rngang blag gis bdag cid mtshon 'debab sA ru nag yod de/ 'du byed thams cad de zlu ma lta bu ga sog/ gsob
209b2('bum): dag las pa/ nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang 'gro ba dang / gsong dang / skyes bu dang / gang bag dang shed can dang / shed bdag/ dang bral bste/ rnam par rtog pa de dag thams
209b3('bum): cad ni yongs su rtog pa las blang ba yin na/ bdag la gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / maklas pa'i tshig brlang bzer ba dang / rdod byug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yo
209b4('bum): / bdag gis ngo bo nyid song ba nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ de ltar rnam par brtag par mi bya'o// zhes bya ba dzin chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de do ltar yongs
209b5('bum): rtog cing / 'bod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ mi skye ba'i chos la 'bod pa 'phob bo// rab 'byor gyis gso pa// 
209b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de la spangs pa ni ci mchis ye shes ni ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
209b7('bum): gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o// de gang gis shes pa de ni babod pa zhes bya ste/ shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la 'a'od ba 'thoba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thong
209b8('bum): lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i
210a1('bum): de dag la bye brag tu bgyib tsamagyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bya rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spangs pa gang yin
210a2('bum): thA nas sems dbu'asugs dada'achen pon bdod pa'o// lan cig ra mos na shes pa gang len padang / thang bgang len pa nan/ byung chub sems dpa' sems
210a3('bum): n+dan po ma 'od pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / thang pa gang yin pa da ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// dgra ba rnam pa'i shes pag
210a4('bum): na pa dang / glang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
210a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin na
210a6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa da lta bu dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ de rnam par smin pa las
210a7('bum): me sa pa'i chos kyi babod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems ded pa'i lam la spyod nang / lam kye rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs pas
210a8('bum): mas su dun dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med ba dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa de lde dang mi
210b1('bum): ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yid/ de sems can rnams yongs su sbyin
210b2('bum): par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byar nas/ skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
210b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
210b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas sra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang
210b5('bum): la pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub ste/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
210b6('bum): mas cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
210b7('bum): par byed do// de lus kyi brtson 'grus des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ theg pa gsam la 'jud cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
210b8('bum): dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// des sems kyi brtson 'grus bag pa med pa/ 
211a1('bum): / lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa/ lam gyi khongs su chud pas/ brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / 
211a2('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 
211a3('bum): sgo gsum dang / gsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
211a4('bum): padag dung de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
211a5('bum): brgyad yongs su 'dus pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la skyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ 
211a6('bum): bu rdzogs pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
211a7('bum): bar byed do// kun du snang ba thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis chud gsum du bskor bskor bar 'gyur ro// de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten / 
211a8('bum): ba drug tu g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun nas g.yo ba dang / 'gul pa dang / rab tu 'gul bdang / kun nas 'phrul ba dang / sdig pa dang / rab tu ldes pa dang / bags leg par
211b1('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bsgra
211b2('bum): kang du byung zhi dang byangs grag par gyur par skud/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ga pa'i snyed kyi bos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum pa nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byong
211b3('bum): ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
211b4('bum): dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thong par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
211b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sla brtan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyum lta tha dang / rmeg rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar
211b6('bum): na nga'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
211b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rmi lelam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brdzun lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyum lta bu dang / sreg su la bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas
211b8('bum): de/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubal te gnas so// 
212a1('bum): / bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsamag tan bzhi pa la nyer bsgrubs te gnas so// bya las kha
212a2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// snying rjel nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba la nya bar bsgrubs te gnas so// btang snyom pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yang skye ma rjed
212a3('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// cung zad med pa'i lce mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'du shes med 'du shes med mi
212a4('bum): / skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo mo// 
212a5('bum): bu'i ting 'dzin la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / thun mong ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang / ldan
212a6('bum): yang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing nye bar bslabs te gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin de dag snyoms par 'jug pa'i
212a7('bum): 'bras bu'i ro myong bar yang mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mtshan nyid med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
212a8('bum): pas na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i chos kyang dngos po med pa'i chos kyis ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur
212b1('bum): doro myong bar byed pa med pas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang / gzugs kyi khams sa pa/ gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mi phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyi
212b2('bum): kyang mi dmigs/ gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gang gis snyoms par 'jug pa de yang mi dmigs so// de mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rngo/ 
212b3('bum): don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las yongs su 'da'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpe
212b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
212b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ nang stong pa nyid la shin du bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid sa shin du bslabs pa dang / phyi nang ste
212b6('bum): panyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslab spa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin du bslabs pa dang / 'dus
212b7('bum): stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la
212b8('bum): shin du bslabs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin du bslabs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang gis
213a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / me dmigs pastong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la shin du bslabs pa dang / ran tad stong pa nyid

220a8('bum): brlangs bur yang dag pa'i skab bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ di lta na chos thams cad mig yor lnga bur yang dag pa skye ba bzhin du/ yongs la tshal ba lag
220b1('bum): mas sa shAm gzungs kal pa la'as/ de lan chos thams na da/  pa tsun du mos pa
220b2('bum): sprul ba lta bur yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
220b3('bum): na pal spyong pa'i tshe/ rmi la ma byi ma thod // myi 'am mthong ba mi mthod do// sra banan mthos so// sgru bdug tan brtso sa min meng ma nga/ mag sa sa skye sa po ma mi thos spru
220b4('bum): mthong ngo // ga gu mi mthong ngo // smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong bo// sprul pa mi mthong ngo // rgal ba ma dzang po ma ma thong // de ci'i sa zhen/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i sde bo rnams kyi rmi lam ni byar
220b5('bum): ba rnyan ni phyin ci log go// mig yor ni phyin ci log go// sgyu ma ni phyir ci log go// rAg tu ni phyin ci log go// sprul pa ni byin ci log go// dgra bcom pa ni rmi lam mi mthong ngo // rmi lam ma
220b6('bum): mthong ngo po// sgra brnyan mi thos so// sra badran rgan pa mi mthong ngo // mig yor mi mthong ngo // mig yor mnod pa mi bzo nga / sku mo mi mthong ngo // skye ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo // thig tu mi mthong ngo // mig
220b7('bum): mthong ba mi mthong ngo // sprul pa mi mthong ngo // skal pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo // rang sangs kyis ni rmi lam mi mthong ngo // rmi la mi mthong ba mi mthong ngo // skra brnyan mi mthos so// swa bad+han nyan pa
220b8('bum): ro// mig yor mi mthong ngo // mig yor mthong ba mi mthong ngo // sa ma mi mthong ngo // sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo // smig rgyu mi mthong ngo // smig tu mthong ba mi mthong ngo // sgru ba pa mi mthong ngo // sprul
221a1('bum): mdza mas nga // byang chub sems dpa'adi tshul ma pa mad // la ba 'thong bas rjod do// skya ba rna ma thos so// ska ba rnyan zhan pa mi mthong ngo do// mag yang mdzadzad// min
221a2('bum): spong ba mi mthong ngo // sum ma mthong ngo // su ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo // smig rgyu mi mthang ngo // smig tu mthong ba mi mthong ngo // sprul ba mi mdzad do// sprul pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegasapa
221a3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me// rmi lam mig rigs so// rmi lam mthong ba mi gzigs so// skya brnyan mi gsan to// sla ba da ni nyar pa mi gzigs so// mig yor ma ga ci
221a4('bum): ga yong mthong ba myi gzigs so// sgyu ras gzigs so// rnams nga ba mi gzigs so// hrI/ d+hA ma kA gas // ga tu mthong bam gzigs sa// sprul pa mi gsags so// sbrul
221a5('bum): gzigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pab yin pas/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ 
221a6('bum): phyir/ chos thams cad yongs su grub pa med de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// dngos po'i 'du shes sam/ yongs su grub pa
221a7('bum): 'du shes pa ma/ yang dag pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba lnga ga la yod de/ de ni garas med do// de ci'i phyir de na/ gal te chos la la zhig gi ngo bo nyi dngam/ yongs su grub pa 'am/ yang dag pa
221a8('bum): kyang yin dmashes da de/ shes rab kyi pha rol byed pang sangs grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de lta da/ gzugs
221b1('bum): pa med do// tshor ba la chags pa med do// 'du shes la chags pa med do// 'du byed la chags pa med do// rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// khams rnams la chags pa med do// skye mched
221b2('bum): rnangs la chags pa med do// der rjeng 'brel bar 'byung ba la chags pa med do// 'dod pa'i khams la chags pa med do// gzugs kyi khams la rgyags pa med do// gzugs med pa'i khams
221b3('bum): zags pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do// bzod pa'i ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do// brtson 'am
221b4('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags ma med do// nang stong pa nyid pa chags pa med do// byi stong
221b5('bum): 'anyid la chags pa med do// phyi nad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid la chags ma med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa mad du/ 
221b6('bum): 'dur byes stong pa rnyed pa chags pa med do// 'dus byam byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// mtha' lal 'das pa spyod pa nyid la chags pa med do// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// 
221b7('bum): da pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// rang bzhin skyong pa nyid la chags pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid spong pa nyid la chags pa med do// mi dpegs pa
221b8('bum): stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags bsad do// ngo bo nyid stong zhid la chags pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo co nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ dran pa ni
222a1('bum): 'a gnag 'anams la chags pa med do// yang dag par rlob pa rnams la chags med do// rdzu bsngal gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med// dbang po rnabs la chags pa med de/ 
222a2('bum): stobs rnams la cha gas pa med // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ 
222a3('bum): ma gtan rnams la chags pa med// tshad ded pa rnams la chags pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad la chags pa med
222a4('bum): 'jab kyis dan sa pa'i sgoms par pa dgu la chags pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pal chags pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams
222a5('bum): chags pa med do// ting reng chen rnamams chag tshang med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas rnams la chags pa med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams
222a6('bum): pa med do// so so yang dga' mig 'arnams la chags pa med// byams pa chen po la chags pa med do// snying rje chen po la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// 
222a7('bum): 'dugal ba'i thas pa sngal chags pa med do// lan cig sbyar 'ong ba'i 'bras bul chags pa med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa med do// dgra bcom pa 'ad la chags pa med do// 
222a8('bum): la cha gas pa med do// lam kyi rnam par shes pa nyid la chagapa pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa ma do// de shes rab kyi sa rol tu phyi pa 'ang la gnas
222b1('bum): padang po song la rdzogs par byed de/ de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi pyod do// de ci'i phyi men/ de ni 'di ltar nges pa de yang mi dmigs na/ der 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'ag
222b2('bum): rab kyi 'tshon du phyin pa 'di la gnas shings gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi byed do// de ci'i byar zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngas su de yang mi dmigs
222b3('bum): dril da pa'i 'drid chags med par sdug la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
222b4('bum): dang ma'i 'dod chags skyed pa lta ga la 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / 
222b5('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni'i'adid ltar nges sa de yang me dmigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par ldag
222b6('bum): 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dil gnas shing / sa lnga pa yangs su rdzogs par byed de/ dri la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa
222b7('bum): bri dmigs / de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par rtag pa 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod
222b8('bum): zhe na/ do ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa
223a1('bum): 'di la gan shing / sa bdud pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chag pa mi skyed do// ci'i phye zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nges car yang mi dkri pa nga/ 
223a2('bum): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lhags 'gyur/ shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa brgyad pa yongs pa rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ma skyed do// 
223a3('bum): nyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngos sa de yang mi dmigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa dgra pa yongs su
223a4('bum): klas par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang mi dmigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par ltag la 'gyur/ 
223a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di skad des sa de yang mi da
223a6('bum): de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta gA la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // shesakyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs so// de mi dmigs pa'i shes
223a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der chos thams cad 'dus par mthong ste/ chos de dag kyang me migs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag
223a8('bum): shes rab rgya pha rol tu phyid pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ci'i phyir ded/ de ni 'di sa chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang med de/ 
223b1('bum): su bstan pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthar bstan pas/ chos thams cad dbyer med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad bye ma mchis pa
223b2('bum): snang na dge pa dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/ ji lta sajig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/ de ltar zag pa dang bcas pa dang / 
223b3('bum): chos rnams bsnur pa lags/ ji ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
223b4('bum): chos rnams ci chos nyid gang yin pa de la/ 'dus byas sam/ 'du ma byas sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras rgya
223b5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ byang chub bam/ sems gang yang brjod du yod dam/ gsom pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bkul
223b6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na/ khyad rjes rnams grang sa des 'di ltar chos thams cad dbyerd med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan das bye med dung thung ba med par rig par bya'o/ 
223b7('bum): rjor gyu chu ba sems dpa'i spyad pa nga shin/ gzugs nas bya ba // tsho skyes b+ha ba 'am/  zhes shes byug / byung sa b+ha ma/ ma
223b8('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mig ces bya ba 'am/ rdo ba zhes bya ba 'am/ snga zhes bya ba 'am/ s+ye zhes bya ba 'am/ lus shes bya ba 'am/ yid ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya
224a1('bum): 'ang/ sgra zhes bya ba 'am/ dri nas bya ba 'am/ ngo zhes bya ba 'am/ sha ces bya ba 'am/ chos shes bya ba 'am/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rna ba'i rnam
224a2('bum): bar shes pa zhes bya gA rab+h+re/ rtswa'i rnam par shis pa nas b+ha ba 'am/ kye'i rnab par shes pa zhes bya ba'am/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes b+hA bA 'am/ yid kyi rnam par she
224a3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba'am/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya
224a4('bum): 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
224a5('bum): ra ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/ lus kyi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis
224a6('bum): zhes bya ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sa'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ chu'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ me khams shes bya ba 'am/ rlung gi/ 
224a7('bum): shes bya ba 'am/ nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes
224a8('bum): ba 'am/ ming dang gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'am/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sred pa de bya ba 'am/ len pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 
224b1('bum): srid pa zhes bya ba'am/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'am/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bzod pa'i pha
224b2('bum): tu phyinaHzhes bya ba 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'am/ bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nang
224b3('bum): stopa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ don dam
224b4('bum): bstong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byos sbyong ba nyid ces bya ba 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces byas pa'am/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
224b5('bum): ngo ba nyid ces bya ba 'am/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nid
224b6('bum): bya ba 'am/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ dngas pa medapa stong ba nyid ces bya ba'am/ ngo ba nyid stong banyid ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo da stong ba nyi
224b7('bum): bya ba 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ dbang po rnams shes bya ba la
224b8('bum): bas rnams shes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes pa ba 'am/ 'phags pa'i lam yan la shebargyad pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'bogs pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba
225a1('bum): 'am/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'am/ tshad med pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ gzugs med pa'i slobs par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'ang/ rnam par ra
225a2('bum): ba brgyad ces bya ba 'am/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba ma/ rnam par thar po'i blo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa meng pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 
225a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin dums shes bya ba 'am/ ga rungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 
225a4('bum): ba na zhes bya ba 'am/ so so yang dag pang rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ byams pa chen po zhes bya ba 'am/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bya ba
225a5('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa med
225a6('bum): pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes
225a7('bum): bya ba 'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ thun mongs kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas
225a8('bum): shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba
225b1('bum): bras bu zhes bya 'jam/ dgra bcom pa zhin ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ chos pa/ 
225b2('bum): gi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem pa dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
225b3('bum): bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o// byang
225b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can rnams su yongs su smin par byed do// sangs
225b5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyab rnas/ sems can rnams ci nas kyang dril bar gyu nas/ sri
225b6('bum): sum mi ldang ba de skar rnam par btul lo//  khyo de ltar dbyar chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi 'arol tu sbyin pa
225b7('bum): gas ba sa // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom sngun 'das chos thom pa cad
225b8('bum): snga bu dngos po ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid yis stong pa rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di
226a1('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rtenasas 'das pa'i chos po// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni
226a2('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni la gan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
226a3('bum): mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'thung ba'o// 
226a4('bum): 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyung 'gyur ba'o// zhes bgyi ba di ltar rnam pa dgod par 'gyur/ chos
226a5('bum): rnams cad rmi la ma ste bre/ smre brnyan lta bu/ mig yo gru/ snu mA wA sa smyig rgyu ste zla/ stsal ba skye bu dngos po ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bzhid/ rang kyi ma
226a6('bum): kyis skyeng ba rnams la/ 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dgeba'i chis so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 
226a7('bum): ga ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi tshe
226a8('bum): pa'i 'bras bu mngod tu bya ba'i rgyud 'gyung ba'o// 'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i chur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras dri mang
226b1('bum): ba'i rdur 'byung ba la/ 'dang kun dung bcom pa 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyud 'gyung ba'o// 'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
226b2('bum): twang chub kyi rgyud 'gyur ba'o// des bgyi byar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la bris pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa po po
226b3('bum): rmilam yang dpogs pa/ zil ma mthong ba yang dmigs so// sgra brnyan yang dmigs la/ sgra brnyad nyan pa yang dmigs so// mig yod yang dmigs le// mgo yor mthong ba yong
226b4('bum): dmigs so// sa ma yang dmigs la/ sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmigs so// smig rgyu yang dmigs la/ smig rgyu mthong ba yang dmigs so// sprul pa yang dmigs la/ sprul pa mthong ba
226b5('bum): dmig so// des rmi lam dmigs/ rmi la ma mthong ba yang dmigs/ sgra brnyan yid dmigs/ sgra brnyan nyin pa yang dmigs/ mig yod yang dmigs/ mig yor mthong ba yang

233a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// zas 'dod pa rnams la zas skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams pa babon pa/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams
233b1('bum): / gros 'dod pa rnams la smos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ gos 'dod pa rngams la gosta/ ma ngan 'dod pa rnams pa nga rgya// gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas/ nor byu
233b2('bum): rgyu dang/ du ba rgyan shes dang / byi dang / gseng dang kyi 'dod pa rnams la/ rnyong du dang tsutig dang paDUn+ya dang / hu dang ma she dang / skye du dang gse sa sa kyi sbyin pa su
233b3('bum): to pa nas/ mI'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul zhing ma
233b4('bum): tong ba dang / ji ltar ring sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnam pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / yang dag par song
233b5('bum): rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba de bzhin du mi gyur pa rnams dang / de ba zhi ni du byol song ga skye gnas su gti gem pa'i sems can thams cad la
233b6('bum): dang du bya ba med pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med pa ste/ des tha dad du bya ba med pa
233b7('bum): byi ngem/ tha dad du bya ba med pa'i chos 'dri lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byol
233b8('bum): zigs su ga 'om pa'i tho chag sbyin pa ben pa yin pa mamangonapa/ 'dibras du 'a ni sbyin gnas ni yang dag po rdzogs pa'i mas rgyas te/ byom mi rdzos bya
234a1('bum): gtogs pa ma yin no snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni// byang chub tu sems
234a2('bum): / 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la ni sbyin pas pha na gdags par bya'o// 'di dag pa ni phan gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
234a3('bum): btu yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin te/ de dag sbyin pas phan btags nas/ byal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ khyime bdag tsho'i
234a4('bum): mtho bo'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te// sbyin pa do na kyi phan btags pa de dag theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya nga
234a5('bum): las 'das par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis gsad par gsol ba btab na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
234a6('bum): dpa' chen pos sbyin no snyam pa 'am/ ma sbyin no snyam pa'i sems gzhag bskyed par mi bya'i/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
234a7('bum): na/ 'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir gal te rnam par rtog na/ sangs rgyas ma
234a8('bum): ldani 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / slob pa rnams dang / lha dang mi dang zhwa
234b1('bum): na du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyod par 'gyur te/ de la thog mang sems can thams cad kyi 'gon gyis shig ce 'ab/ gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyis shig ces sus
234b2('bum): gsol ba gang bcas smod par 'gyur ba/ rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du mir gyur pa 'am/ mi ma yin par gyur shA 'ong nas
234b3('bum): dag ni slong mo pa'o zhes yan lag dang nying lag gcad par gsol ba btab na/ de'i tshe des sbyin nam mi sbyin skam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
234b4('bum): di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can rnams kyi don du ched du bsams te/ lus 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o zhes lus yongs
234b5('bum): rung bas na/ des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi don tu lus yongs su gzung gzung bas/ de dag baspang mi dgos par khyer zhing deng zhig ces sems bskyed par bya// 
234b6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
234b7('bum): dpa' chen pos/ slong mo ba mthong na/ 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med na/ 'di la su zhig ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong / sul ni sbyin par bya/ 
234b8('bum): ka ni sbyin par bya zhes sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nid kyis stong pa ste// stong pa nyid la
235a1('bum): gnas gang la yang yongs su gtong ba'am/ ganga'as kyang 'grogs pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// she
235a2('bum): rol tu sbyin pa dang sa te/ nang stong pa nyid dag/ sbyi ba snyed / byin stong ba nyid dam/ nga ba zhi stong ba nyid da/ na no dag
235a3('bum): dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor pa med pa stong pa
235a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa 'do dam/ chos thams cad snang ba dod dam/ rang gi sa tshan nid stong pa nyid dang/ 'di migs stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ji da slong
235a5('bum): dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// de stong pa nyid de dag la gnas shing / sbyin pa gtod na de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ya
235a6('bum): par 'gyur te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ phyi dang nang gi chos la bcad cing gtubs kyang / bdag la su yang 'grub bam gcad do snyam pa'i sems mi 'byung ngo // 
235a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brje pa/ bam po zhes brgya don bdun pa/ rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/ 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar gyi
235a8('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gna'i klung gi bye ma sbed da/ na/ byang chub sems de'i sems dpa' chen po dang ched du 'asams te/ sems can myal ba chen po dag tu da/ sa
235b1('bum): dbya bang chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi 'ang byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yo su 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gi sems
235b2('bum): can dmyal 'a pa'i sems can de dag 'o// sa cong/ rdzu phrul gyi tshu la kyi sems can dmyal ba rkyen pa'i sdug bsngal de dag ni ba bya ste/ yongs su brtan cho 'a
235b3('bum): dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang
235b4('bum): snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag/ byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po de dag le/ sems mos par byas shing / 
235b5('bum): na dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas lha dang mi dag dang skul ba mnyam par skyes shing / 
235b6('bum): kyis thog pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas ci k+ShAn 'jig rten la rnam pa gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi na
235b7('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dam
235b8('bum): 'a chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i chos 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum
236a1('bum): dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag pa chos skor cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmya chen po'i sdug bsngal de
236a2('bum): par byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngadag byams pa chen
236a3('bum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston des sems can dmyal ba pa' sems can de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
236a4('bum): chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing // sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs
236a5('bum): nas/ lha dang mi ngag dang bskal pa marnam par skyes shing / rim gyis thag pa gsum gyis sdug bsnga la mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
236a6('bum): sman gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched
236a7('bum): sams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phral dang / yongs su bstan
236a8('bum): 'a da ngas nas kyi phrul dang / tshe 'du lags ma du pa sems can dmyal la ba'i sems cad de dag chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can
236b1('bum): chen po'i sdug bsdu sa de dag ni bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bya
236b2('bum): po/ chen po dang / doga' chen po dang / bting snyoms chen thos chos ston te/ des sems can dmal ba pa'i sems can de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
236b3('bum): sems mos par byas shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag
236b4('bum): la pa mnyam par skyes shing rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
236b5('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems
236b6('bum): can dkyil ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhing ra byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag
236b7('bum): sems can dmyal 'apa'i sems can de dag lnga chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can dma' ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dga'i bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa
236b8('bum): 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams po chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / 
237a1('bum): btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems cadangadamyal ba pa'i sems can dngag byang chuba'ams dpa' sems pas chen po dang / la sems mas pa byas shA
237a2('bum): sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ltung ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs naste/ lha dang me dag dang skal ba ma nyam par skyes shing rim gyis theg
237a3('bum): pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
237a4('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug
237a5('bum): bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis/ sems can dmyal
237a6('bum): pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug sngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes

237a8('bum): napopo chos ston to// des sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems cad
237b1('bum): dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen pod dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim
237b2('bum): rdzas k+She ga pa ka sum gyis sdug bsgra ma par 'byin pa mthong ngo po// rab 'byor ngas 'dinams AH kyi sbyin gyis ji // rten dam pa gzigs na/ shA sgo'i phyogs mtshams
237b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tshod dung sems te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems
237b4('bum): cacan dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum
237b5('bum): dedag gis/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ 
237b6('bum): bsnun pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su stan pa'i tshu phrul ts+tshi chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' khams da 'i chen po de dag byams pa chen
237b7('bum): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
237b8('bum): la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang ming
238a1('bum): dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di na pa sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
238a2('bum): 'dig rten la rnam pa sa/ rigs na/ lho rlob kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi r+ya klung gi bye sa snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i rkyen
238a3('bum): dag chod du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs
238a4('bum): bstan pa'i chos 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul grwa sum po de dag gis/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul
238a5('bum): sa chos 'phrul gyis/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos
238a6('bum): ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / ting rje chen po dang / dka' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des
238a7('bum): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas
238a8('bum): dam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skam pa mnyam par skyes shing / mi phyimi reg pa gsus kyis ldug
238b1('bum): bshar 'byin pa mdzod do// rab 'byor ngas 'di na sasangs rgyas kyi spyad kyi 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gna'i klung gi skye
238b2('bum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar
238b3('bum): nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum pa de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems
238b4('bum): de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan
238b5('bum): pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btod snyoms
238b6('bum): pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mol bar byas shing / sems can
238b7('bum): ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nupa rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / 
238b8('bum): kyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sbyin gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi
239a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba
239a2('bum): ngag tu dong zhing / sems can dbral ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
239a3('bum): dang / tshe 'phrul gsum po de dag gis/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsnga
239a4('bum): de dga'i 'ang byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po
239a5('bum): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems

239a7('bum): mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnas 'dag
239a8('bum): na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba
239b1('bum): chen po don tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sduka bsngal zhingamabyas nas/ rdu 'a tsholadu pa dang / yongs su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / sas bstan pa'i
239b2('bum): dang / cho 'phrul ka phub po de dag gis/ sems can dmyal ba po'i sems can de dag la chos sto cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug ba
239b3('bum): zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen
239b4('bum): de rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen pos dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ ngas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
239b5('bum): pa sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag pa
239b6('bum): skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mtha' 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di ni nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par ga
239b7('bum): shar phyogs so 'jig rten gyi khams gad re krung gi bye ma srid dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed
239b8('bum): chod ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs
240a1('bum): byon pas ma na gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / mgus pas ma yin ni/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen pa bur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems da
240a2('bum): da da// sa rgyab bcom ldan 'das de 'tshu gang bsnun pa de yang mdzin cing bas thun me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo
