311b8('bum): 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med do// rab 'byor lam ma bsgom par yang 'bras bu thob pa med/ lam gyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang med de/ lam mi gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi
312a1('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub semam dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bum
312a2('bum): pa dgod pa byed de/ 'dus byas gyi khams pam/ 'dus na byas kyi ngam ma'is sug cid cing 'bras bu rnam par dgad pas byed do// rgas papa bamamaldan 'das gas nyid sang 'dus byas
312a3('bum): khamasas ma/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa
312a4('bum): 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems srabs pas/ lan gcig yir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i mtshan gyi kun du sbyor po lnga spangs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 
312a5('bum): 'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i cha can du shes pas rang byang chub po// bag chags
312a6('bum): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su gcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas
312a7('bum): chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis rwa/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor d+hAn ba zhugs pa
312a8('bum): 'bras bu'am/ la ni cig por 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
312b1('bum): /  'ayino// gas ga ba mdzad 'a/ 'a 'dus / mthun 'das byas / 'astsalag
312b2('bum): rab 'byor 'o na 'dus pa byas kyi chos la ris su gcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de snyam du sems/ gang
312b3('bum): tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus pa byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas shes 'am/ 'dus
312b4('bum): byas shes chos gang la yang ram su gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
312b5('bum): dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dpa
312b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
312b7('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtso
312b8('bum): nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la nges su gcad pas chos ma ston to// de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin du phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
313a1('bum): phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan dang po'am/ bsam pa dang/ 
313a2('bum): gnyis pa'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ dka' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' las kye mtshad
313a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
313a4('bum): min skye mched kyi skams par 'jug pa'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams
313a5('bum): sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ lam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnam
313a6('bum): sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sapa
313a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgron ma sa la ma/ de gi gshegs 'i rtang rnams mi 'jigs rnamasas gnam su la na dngas sa ma byams pa chen pol gting chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa rjes
313a8('bum): parnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de la mngon
313b1('bum): pabazhen pa med pas/ gang la yang chags pa med do// 'di ltar dbang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams
313b2('bum): myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ tshul khrims
313b3('bum): 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan zla ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo // bsod pa bsgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bzod
313b4('bum): papa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i don du bzod pa bsgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la chags pa
313b5('bum): / med/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i dod du/ brtson 'grus brtsomo// bsam gtan la snyongs par 'jug

313b7('bum): la snyoms par 'jug go// shes rab bsgom yang / shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ shes rab kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan
313b8('bum): las bzla ba'i don du shes rab bsgom mo// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom yang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa

314a6('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

314a8('bum): gang ma yang gnas pa'am/ chags pa med do// de ci'i phyi she na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi na nyid shin tu bong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong brog brgya
314b1('bum): sa mngon dang po byad babang po mngon par sgrub pa dang / pha rol tu rten pa bstan pa'i la ni rje gtu ngan pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa stong phrag dargya pa/ ba ma po nyas
314b2('bum): gnyis pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad di ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams kyi chos

315a1('bum): spyod pa med do// lnga'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// kye'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//

315b1('bum): do// srod pa la yongs su sred pa med do// khon par yongs su spyod pa med do// srid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// b+ha ba la yongs su spyad pa med do// rga shil yong pa sa spyad pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

316b2('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas/ chong rnams kyi chos kyi tshan
316b3('bum): nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bskems pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bang yang mi 'gyur la/

316b5('bum): la la zhige la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na sdang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dang / 
316b6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas/ dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam
316b7('bum): par byung bar 'akur ba'am 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang
316b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs thams cad
317a1('bum): rdung lta bu lags sa pa/ tshong ba thams cang sprul pa d+ha bu lasas sam/ du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du byad thams cad sprul pa/ l+la

317a8('bum): 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sem/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya pa'i sems can gang yad dmi gas sam/ gsol pa bcom
317b1('bum): 'das de na pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum nas yongs su

317b3('bum): / rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong te/ rtogs la/ sprul pa la
317b4('bum): bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/

317b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhes spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa
318a1('bum): lpags/ snying chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco bkyang la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
318a2('bum): po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan
318a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
318a4('bum): sems can rnams kyi donas/ skal ba grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i skang pa mi spyod de/ rab byo thams can da ma 'i// chos thams cad skal pa lta bur mi shes pas/ 
318a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po// sprul pa grangs med par/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su
318a6('bum): dag par byed do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gas te chos thams cad rmi lam lta thu brnyan lta bla/ smig cu lbu bu/ mig yor lba ba/ sgram lta bu/ sbal pa lta bu lags
318a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin paskyed cing / sems can rnams gyen du spyod par
318a8('bum): kyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems 'i ming dang mtshanas dag pa ma yin par yongs su rtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
318b1('bum): mas dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag mang dang mtshan ma las byin du skyed do// gsol ga bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/ mtshan man gang lags/ 
318b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni/ blo bur gyi ming gi sgo btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba
318b3('bum): 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 
318b4('bum): bye'u des bya ba 'am/ bu mo nas bya ba'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas shes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes
318b5('bum): bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus pa byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir
318b6('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba ni/ ska ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ byis pa
318b7('bum): sa'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'angadra byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/ 
318b8('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid kyis song pa la/ khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams
319a1('bum): da stong pa la mdzes pa rnams namangon par non par mi byed do// sa skul pa byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab
319a2('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams 'chos ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan ma gang she na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams sa
319a3('bum): la chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan pa dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan mo gang zhe na/ 
319a4('bum): 'das pa dang / da ltar blang ba'i gzugs rags pa'am/ phra ba 'am/ dbang ba'am/ dran pa'am/ rkyang ring pa'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtogs pas
319a5('bum): bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang yang rung ste/ mtshan mar gzungs
319a6('bum): bas yongs su brtags shing / nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan pa zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi
319a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing / rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan
319a8('bum): 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o// zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de lang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha la
319b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe/ thags mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
319b2('bum): chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ de tsam du ngas te/ ming dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su rtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems
319b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'tho ba la gzhog cing dge
319b4('bum): 'irtsa ba de dag gis/ sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te
319b5('bum): dngos po'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kya pang thob par yang mi
319b6('bum): 'gyur te/ gzhan yang zad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med/ dngos po yang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
319b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa
319b8('bum): tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i
320a1('bum): tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis min pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan
320a2('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis pasam gtan 'ani yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshan med pa ni yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul phyi dra
320a3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bani yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
320a4('bum): zhe yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ 
320a5('bum): batshun ma med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed de// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par
320a6('bum): byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
320a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
320a8('bum): sa chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
320b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das bsko
320b2('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan sa med pa'i tshul gyis thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis der ba med pa stong pa
320b3('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
320b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ye su rdzogs par byed// 
320b5('bum): na med 'tshur gyi dam po med stong nyid po su dgas par byed// mtshan ma med pa'i dul gyi ngos nyid stong nyid la su rdzo gus par spyo/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
320b6('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
320b7('bum): de gu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
320b8('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan
321a1('bum): ma meng pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa' tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ma
321a2('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma
321a3('bum): par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
321a4('bum): gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su
321a5('bum): rdzogs par byas nas mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na/ skra'i rtse mo cha shas gzhag pa tsam gyi byon cig gi
321a6('bum): ma yod da yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma med/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ de mngon par
321a7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos tha
321a8('bum): dade/ mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
321b1('bum): / thogapa med pa'i rgyas rnams kyis/ sems can thams na tudon byed do// gas lag bcom ldan 'das gang / da chos thams cad patshanam ma mchis shipa dran pa sa te/ med
321b2('bum): ba kyi 'ams chi mA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dku ni dge ba'i tsham mo// da dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chosas// 'di dag ni 'drig rten lan 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag na drug pa dang sa
321b3('bum): chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos// ded ni/ dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 
321b4('bum): dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi// 
321b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ba myong do lta du sems mtshanam med pa yang gardal/ nyan chos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhazhan na/ gsolapa/ bco ldan 'das de lta ma 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
321b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
321b7('bum): chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
321b8('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong po'i 'bras bu'o// dgra 'atsam pa nyi dang // rang byang chub
322a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcwol ldan zhes/ 
322a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i
322a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzo
322a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
322a5('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 
322a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang
322a7('bum): gimatshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran
322a8('bum): panye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phag
322b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bani dang / tshad med pa bani dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar par rgya/ 
322b2('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
322b3('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
322b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
322b5('bum): dpa' chen pos ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslabs par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam
322b6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo 'di dag gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'dus pa med do// 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral/ 
322b7('bum): ba ni/ mtshan ma med pa rnam thang thu pa'i sgo'o// mngon par shA bu med pa ni sngon pa med pa'i rnam par tha~Mng de'i dri ste/ rnam par thar po'i sgogasum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub
322b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
323a1('bum): yan log 'dugags na bams sbyin pashA rab tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rdul khrims kyi pha rolatu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
323a2('bum): la slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin
323a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 
323a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slab pa yin/ mtha' mas 'das pa spong pa nyid la slob pa'i
323a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin spong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
323a6('bum): pa yin/ rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngol po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
323a7('bum): slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la grub pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'ini la slob pa yin/ yang dag par snad pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ 
323a8('bum): rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan la
323b1('bum): bslab pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa'in/ tshad med par nal slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhil
323b2('bum): slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
323b3('bum): dang / spyod pa med pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
323b4('bum): pa'i stobs bcul slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob
323b5('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi cho sngam 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams
323b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis tshul du/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi
323b7('bum): rol du phyid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
323b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kye de bzhin nyid de lta bu yin pa
324a1('bum): shin du snying po med pa rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no// de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jigs pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / 
324a2('bum): du yang 'gre med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes te/ de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jigs pa shes
324a3('bum): pa yin no// ji ska gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi ste mi 'gral/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang
324a4('bum): da yin/ 'brib ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yim/ phyin ci log pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa
324a5('bum): yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i chu bur gsag tu 'dug pa skye shing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na
324a6('bum): reba'i skye ba dang / 'jigs pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ang ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / glang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gdan
324a7('bum): kyang ma 'ongs pa de/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jigs pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor bri
324b1('bum): nyid de skyes 'grag rung ba med 'grob med/ kun ras nyon nongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar yin/ 'thob pa yin/ 'phel ba ma yin to// phyin ci log sa yin zhingapa de bzhin nyid
324b2('bum): nas pa ste/ de phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na chur ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes pa yin no na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smig hru la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa
324b3('bum): ra shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med
324b4('bum): pas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// 
324b5('bum): de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bam
324b6('bum): 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ de byin ci dag ma yin ning/ de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes nga yin no// 
324b7('bum): ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta skye dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye nas/ snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no// 
324b8('bum): na'adu byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang ma 'gra
325a1('bum): // oM oM seM da ma shes pa/  das cu kyi b+hU dug zhis yin//  rgyu tu na
325a2('bum): shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'jal ba
325a3('bum): ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar ma rnam par shes
325a4('bum): pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sku ma byed pa/ sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bcu da ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na
325a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du
325a6('bum): ying mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes nga yin no// de ltar na rnam
325a7('bum): bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ 
325a8('bum): ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa sde de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de ba'i
325b1('bum): nyid shes pa yin no// de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no ma/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyi stong / byi'i chos rnams cad phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/  gyur
325b2('bum): skye mched rnams shes pa yin na// de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin nan/ mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi
325b3('bum): mas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang
325b4('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 
325b5('bum): khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rwa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gA'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
325b6('bum): kyirang bzhin gyis stong po/ lce'i khams kyang lce'i rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de 'i khams kyang de'i khams kyis rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
325b7('bum): 'irnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi khams kyang las kyi khams kyi rang bzhin kyis stod do// reg gi khams kyir reg gi khams kyi dang ba
325b8('bum): kyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pakhams kyi rang bzhin gyis sbyor ro// yid mas kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang ba na
326a1('bum): do// chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang brkyen gyis stong ngo do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
326a2('bum): kyis stong ngo do// zhes bya bar shes te de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten ring 'brel bar 'byung ba yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes
326a3('bum): dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / char pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don cig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa
326a4('bum): dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhi zhi bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yid de na/ 
326a5('bum): sdug bsnga' 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ yun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'ang
326a6('bum): pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i badren
326a7('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su sbed pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'god par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i
326a8('bum): bdan pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal byed bzhin
326b1('bum): sabya gas pa yin/ de bzhin du kyad 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang/ la gyi na nyid kyang rang tu shes pa na/ des 'phags pa'i bden pa dan nyid
326b2('bum): shes pa yin no// de nas ma dang ldan pa dang kyi kyis/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gas ted sbyar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che dang // 
326b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs pa mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
326b4('bum): rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la ra zhig yod na ni/ rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyangs su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang
326b5('bum): 'dimigs so// gal te dmigs na ni chol kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir gle na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sa
326b6('bum): rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so// de ltar mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbying sum gtogs pa'i chos gzhan
326b7('bum): des bya bar btags pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// 
326b8('bum): rab byer kyis pasel ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos kyi dbyings la slob pas/ gang la bsgrubs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
327a1('bum): bka' la pa/ rab 'bya dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos na/ chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te/ da

327a4('bum): gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang //

327a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te mos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phrin du la spyod pas/ ji
327a8('bum): ga sel bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes
327b1('bum): pA la bslab par bkri/ ji lta rnams dang / skye mched dmas dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul/

327b7('bum): ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji la
327b8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par 'gyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bkyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid la bsgrub par bgyi/ 
328a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhal bslab par bgyi/ dza d+har yang dag par spang ba bzhi la bslab par babya/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par

328b1('bum): pa bkye/ dza ltar mtshan po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnas dang / dang bya/ 'azang pa brgyad cu yangs su 'grub par bgyi ba la bslab par ba/ de ltar rdul rigs ma

329a1('bum): 'argyab la bslab par ran+te/ de ltar rlu rje'i sgrar sgru bar bslaba' bslab par ban+d+ha/ dza ltar tshad med che pa'i ltang skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par

330b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bkye/ phyi rang stong pa nyid la ba

330b5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsrab par bgyi/ dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par
330b6('bum): gyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams la bslab par bikya/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan
330b7('bum): 'ag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya pal bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par brgya/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par baH
330b8('bum): tshad med pa rnams bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar par bcad la bslab par baN+Di/ ma nar gyis gnas pa'i
331a1('bum): / snyoms par 'jug pa dgul bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par brgya/ mngon par na
331a2('bum): pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par
331a3('bum): bgyi/ mi 'jig pa rnams la brlab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po
331a4('bum): bslang par dgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
331a5('bum): bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom po nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa
331a6('bum): shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
331a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po// byin ci log la spyod pa'am/ mi slo ba smos par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang /
